participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, always eager to learn about different cultures.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a small town in Georgia, she enjoys exploring new places and meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, he loves to share stories and make others laugh.
participant_2.background: Originally from Alabama, he has a deep appreciation for Southern culture and hospitality.
